CTHULHUDARK.FailureRuleText: Cannot be used on Investigation Rolls or if success is needed for the scenario.
CTHULHUDARK.TryingAgainRuleText: If you include or included your Insight Die, You can reroll. Each reroll, may increase Insight. Reroll as much as you want.
CTHULHUDARK.CooperateRuleText: Everyone rolls. Keep the highest die rolled by anyone.
CTHULHUDARK.CompeteRuleText: Everyone who is competing rolls their dice. The highest die wins.
CTHULHUDARK.DoSomethingElseDialogDesc: When you do something other than investigating, roll:
CTHULHUDARK.DialogHumanDie: If the task is within human capabilities.
CTHULHUDARK.DialogOccupDie: If itâ€™s within your occupational expertise.
CTHULHUDARK.DialogRiskDie: If you will risk your mind to succeed.
